str.name: examples
str.val:
This pattern will search for P.O. boxes. It will select any variation/abbreviation/combination of "post office," including single periods for abbreviations, as long as numbers follow.
For example, the following would be marked for redaction: PO Box 1234 P.O. Box 1234 PO. Box 1234 pobox 1234 Post office Box 1234
